com.luigisgro.cqf.curve - package com.luigisgro.cqf.curve
Interest rate curves and curve time-series data types for HJM processing
com.luigisgro.cqf.curve.loaders - package com.luigisgro.cqf.curve.loaders

com.luigisgro.cqf.fdm - package com.luigisgro.cqf.fdm
All the Finite Difference Method code is contained in this package
com.luigisgro.cqf.function - package com.luigisgro.cqf.function
A light model of scalar functions, used within the HJM framework to model volatility functions
com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm - package com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm
Core package with the implementation of the Monte Carlo simulation framework MultiFactorModel specifically for the HJM model (MultiFactorHJM) and the implementation of some interest rate derivative models to be used with it.
com.luigisgro.cqf.job - package com.luigisgro.cqf.job
This package contains the high-level implementation of the complete processing for: HJM: HJMJob FDM: FDMJob together with support classes to read job configuration from property files.
com.luigisgro.cqf.linalg - package com.luigisgro.cqf.linalg
A light linear algebra library, relying on lazy evaluation and immutable object where convenient
com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo - package com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo
The Monte Carlo framework, in a generic implementation for curve time series, with a generic number of factors.
com.luigisgro.cqf.pca - package com.luigisgro.cqf.pca
Implementation of the Principal Component Analysis needed for the HJM model.
com.luigisgro.cqf.util - package com.luigisgro.cqf.util
A few utility interfaces and classes generic enough to not fit in any other package
